Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a black-painted inscription.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394266) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394266)
